docs.title: FastAPI Reverse Proxy
docs.text: A FastAPI-based reverse proxy that secures backend services with Keycloak authentication and dynamically routes requests.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• ✅ Keycloak authentication enforcement
  • ✅ Kubernetes/OpenShift-ready
  • ✅ Asynchronous FastAPI implementation
  • ✅ Reverse proxy request forwarding
  • ✅ Secure session management

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text: ```bash git clone https://github.com/yourusername/fastapi-reverse-proxy.git cd fastapi-reverse-proxy pip install -r requirements.txt uvicorn src.app:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload
